text: Angelo Spanio (October 4, 1939 in Venice – October 1, 1999gazetta.it retrieved 18th Feb 2011 (Italian)) was an Italian professional football player. He played for 3 seasons (28 games, 3 goals) in the Serie A for A.C. Torino and A.S. Roma. ==References== * Career summary by playerhistory.com Category:1939 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:F.C. title: Angelo Spanio
